event.name: The 19th Annual Twin Cities Book Festival Minnesota State Fair Grounds Saturday, October 12 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM Find The Tower Magazine

Ivory Tower Launch Party Weisman Art Museum Thursday, April 27 6:00 PM Come celebrate with Ivory Tower, the undergraduate art and literary magazine! We are celebrating the 2016 magazine launch and the tenth anniversary. Visit the Weisman Art Museum at 6:00 p.m., on April 27 for music, food, readings of student literature and student art displays.
